commentBody:
@sjs, you are separating the 10% who post this garbage from the "90%" by calling them "total losers" - but not everyone twitters and some people know that it's possible to trace this back.

The plain fact of it is that any person who can bear to support Trump is supporting this stuff, and that percentage is massively larger. Go into the ordinary workplace and you go beyond talk to consequences for working women in terms of opportunity and pay that are based on unspoken prejudice.

Twitter could stop this in a heartbeat. Yahoo could stop this. The businesses employing these women could find ways to support these women and stop this as well - but they are forcing these women to confront these messages on a 7x24x356 basis. There just isn't that much real care and respect for women.
